record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE HOUSE

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I rise to a question of the privileges of the House, and I send to the desk a resolution.

record.chair: The Clerk will report the resolution.
record.narrative: The Clerk read the resolution, as follows:

speaking.topic: MOTION TO TABLE OFFERED BY MR.
speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I demand a recorded vote.

record.chair: The Chair would also add that all Members please vote during the allotted time.
